description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Spin of the Coin. A romance of the Far West and of the Riding Ring ... Containing also “Stranger than Fiction” by C. Kernahan. “The Man with the Fatal Finger” by W. Le Queux. “The Head of the Family” by R. André. Illustrated, etc" Author: GALBRAITH, Lettice. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012630.h.19." Page: 98 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: Ward, Lock & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001351862 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
